articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Peru's Fujimori, divisive head of political dynasty, dies age 86 - Reuters Canada
articles.description: Former Peruvian president Alberto Fujimori, who steered economic growth during the 1990s but was later jailed for human rights abuses stemming from a bloody war against Maoist rebels, died on Wednesday. He was aged 86.
